about_the_game:
Imagine a world where the most remarkable technological achievements are hidden by a secretive government organization known as The Unimaginable Foundation. Suppressed from society, these technologies are used in secret to manipulate the public. Human hybrid cloning, fusion power, technological weaponry akin to magic, and AI so advanced it poses an existential threat to human civilization.

You play as Detective Steven Thorne. On the way to a scheduled divorce proceeding, you receive a call about a disturbance at the 1st Street Subway station—the same station your ex-wife is taking to the law offices of William and Greg. Despite the federal government's blockade, you defy the law you swore to uphold to save her. What you find down there is anything but normal.

Features

- Exploration
Delve into an isometric twin-stick shooter world beneath the city streets as the worst experiments of The Unimaginable Foundation escape their confines.

- Interaction
Solve interactive puzzles as you break open the vault of this unraveling mystery.

- Gunplay
Enhance your character beyond humanity with futuristic weaponry as your foes become deadlier the deeper you go.

- Dialog
Draw inspiration from NPCs you meet on this journey or simply skip them with the pull of a trigger, loosening your morals in pursuit of your goals.

About Warped Imagination


I am a solo developer with several decades of experience in the games industry. Join me as I create this game, share its inspirations, and explore the intricacies of game development.

The Unimaginable Foundation is a passion project that started as an idea in late 2023 and after much community support grew into the game you see today.

content_descriptors.notes: The Unimaginable Foundation contains strong language, violence, blood and gore.
